==Trial Character==
{{Transclude|Wailing Cacophony|Trial Character}}

==Walkthrough==
# Pursue [[Tlazolli]]
# Defeat the enemies {{Enemy List|Forged Sand Interrogator*2;Forged Sand Shieldbreaker;Forged Sand Javelineer}}
#* An '''Exquisite Chest''' unlocks after the fight.
# Continue via the [[Molten Fissure]]s and solid [[Phlogiston]] walls
# Defeat the enemies {{Enemy List|Forged Sand Shieldbreaker;Forged Sand Javelineer}}
#* A '''Common Chest''' can be found on the left side after these enemies.
# Continue via the [[Molten Fissure]]s and solid [[Phlogiston]] walls
# Defeat the enemies
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Forged Sand Interrogator*3;Forged Sand Javelineer}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Tepetlisaurus Warrior: Shard Striker*2;Tepetlisaurus Warrior: Rockbreaker Blade}}
#* An '''Exquisite Chest''' unlocks after the fight.
# Pull the levers to open the gates, then use the [[Molten Fissure]]s and solid [[Phlogiston]] walls to reach them before they close
# Confront Tlazolli
